Sadowsky, Michael J.

Tiffin, Peter
DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: StantonGeddes2013_Medicago_leaf_data
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Spreadsheet of plant leaf data collected by Mohammed Yakub for genome-wide association analysis. Columns are: pot (unique ID that corresponds to plants in "StantonGeddes2013_Medicago_plant_data.csv" file), Trichomes (number of trichomes in the 2 mm long area immediately below the leaf), width mm (width of the petiole in the area where trichomes were counted), petiole area (petiole width times 2 cm), leaf area (area estimated from leaf scan by ImageJ), leaf weight (weight of each leaf after at least 24 hours of drying)
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: mutualism
genome-wide association
genetic architecture
